document.full_text: the father of accused killer casey anthony testified on friday that he recognized the odor of human decomposition coming from her car trunk on july 15, 2008, and said a quiet prayer that the stench was not the body of his daughter or grandchild caylee.
document.title: witnesses smelled death odor from casey anthony's car
lines_and_colors: the father of accused killer casey anthony testified on friday that he recognized the odor of human decomposition coming from her car trunk on july 15, 2008, and said a quiet prayer that the stench was not the body of his daughter or grandchild caylee.
